MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Williamwood Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.50pm. Our engineers have arrived at Strathdee substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.43pm on the 27th of March 2021.
